ENROLL_SECRET.description: Either one value or several space-delimited values

OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: Google's client ID to use for user authentication, if not provided then auth will be disabled

OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Google's client ID to use for user authentication

OAUTH_ALLOWED_USERS.description: Space-delimited list of allowed Google user IDs (or emails?)

MAIL_SERVER.description: SMTP server to send emails with (mailing will be disabled unless this is provided)

MAIL_PORT.description: SSL-enabled port on the mail server

MAIL_RECIPIENTS.description: List of mail recipients, separated by ';'
